attributes.action: Not raise Council Tax for houses with 'Green' upgrades.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are reports that local councils are considering raising the Council Tax on houses which have eco-friendly improvements such as solar panels and wind turbines. People should not be financially discouraged from making their own energy saving improvements. Council Tax should not be effected by positive environmental improvements.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Not raise Council Tax for houses with 'Green' upgrades."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
